courses.description: Explore the fundamentals of web development, covering HTML, CSS, and basic JavaScriptand breathe life into visually appealing web pages from scratch.
Learn the fundamental concepts of Python programming, including variables, data types, control structures, and functions.

We start this course by looking in detail at the fundamental building blocks: arrays and linked lists. From there, we build up two important data structures: stacks and queues. Next, we look at trees: examples of how they are used in Computer Science, how they are implemented, and the various ways they can be traversed. Once you have completed this course, you will be able to implement any of these data structures, as well as have a solid understanding of the costs of the operations, as well as the tradeoffs involved in using each data structure.
Comprehensive course covering both front-end (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and back-end (Node.js, Express, MongoDB) development.
